Subject: Update Your Avishkar Lab Application Account
Body:
Welcome to Avishkar NPD Lab Application.
 This will help you monitor & analyse test bench operation remotely to optimize the testing of the equipment’s.
Body2:
Follow below steps to setup password to access application:
1.Click on link https://avishkarlab.idexinsights.ai 
2.Enter “Actual Username” in username tab
3.Click on “Forgot Password?”
Body3:
4.Enter OTP received on email or phone
5.Enter OTP and set the password
6.Reset after entering OTP and password
7.Login with Username and password
Body4:
In case of any trouble, please contact iotlab@idexcorp.com
Thank You,
Avishkar NPD Lab

Body1:
